channel.title: representation learning on
channel.description: Recent content in representation learning on

item.title: Generative-inference models: Theory and empirical analysis (Part II)
item.description: Many Generative models have an infertence counter part. In this work we explore how they are formulated. We also studied their representation learning and generative capabilities theoretically and empirically.

item.title: Generative-inference models: Theory and empirical analysis (Part I)
item.description: Many Generative models have an infertence counter part. In this work we explore how they are formulated. We also studied their representation learning and generative capabilities theoretically and empirically.
